snippet: Plentiful jobs at good pay, the critical underpinning of a strong economy, are still not in the cards.
abstract: Editorial warns that August employment report showing stagnant wages and job creation does not bode well for end of 2014; points to increase in income inequality since 2010 and asserts that such inequality is inhibiting economic growth; says situation will not correct itself, and that government must enact policies that will improve standard of living for average Americans.
lead_paragraph: Plentiful jobs at good pay, the critical underpinning of a strong economy, are still not in the cards.

headline.main: Jobs Stall and So Does the Economy
headline.print_headline: Jobs Stall and So Does the Economy
